1.0.name: wordpress/crunchbase-widget
1.0.description:
Easily include CrunchBase widgets, example syntax:

  • [cb type="company"]Amazon[/cb]
  • [cb type="person"]Jeremy Schoemaker[/cb]
  • [cb type="financial"]Alliance Capital[/cb]
  • [cb type="product"]Amazon Kindle[/cb]

If you leave out the type=, it will default to company, so [cb]TechCrunch[/cb] would work too.

More info:

  • CrunchBase Widget.
  • Check out the other Wordpress plugins by the same author.
